descriptive_analysis.purpose: Classify frame types and communication structure

frame_taxonomy.issue_framing: Arms control as cooperation vs competition management
frame_taxonomy.valence_framing: Positive cooperation outcomes vs negative competition

explanatory_analysis.purpose: Explain psychological mechanisms and frame processing

psychological_mechanisms.availability: Peace concepts made available through repetition and emphasis
psychological_mechanisms.applicability: Universal human values connect with audience beliefs
psychological_mechanisms.motivated_reasoning: Appeals designed to align with Southern values

individual_moderators.predisposition: Southern audience values independence and skepticism of Washington
individual_moderators.political_knowledge: Legislative audience has high political sophistication
individual_moderators.motivation: High motivation due to foreign policy responsibilities
individual_moderators.partisanship: Bipartisan foreign policy tradition appeals across parties
individual_moderators.core_values: Peace, self-reliance, moral leadership, practical results

expectancy_value_model.salience_weights: Speech attempts to increase peace/cooperation weights

predictive_analysis.purpose: Forecast framing effects and audience responses

audience_response_forecasts.high_knowledge_effect: Complex frame engagement due to political sophistication
audience_response_forecasts.predisposition_interaction: Southern pragmatism will moderate idealistic elements
audience_response_forecasts.motivation_amplification: High political motivation increases frame processing

framing_effects_timeline.immediate: Frame availability increased through speech exposure
framing_effects_timeline.long_term: Learning over time may reduce framing susceptibility

causal_analysis.purpose: Identify framing causal pathways and effects (balanced treatment)

framing_effects_causation.pathway: Frame Exposure → Consideration Activation → Attitude Formation
Source Credibility → Frame Acceptance → Opinion Change
Frame Strength → Competitive Advantage → Public Opinion

moderating_causation.effect: Conditions frame acceptance based on consistency
Filters frame processing through existing beliefs
Amplifies or reduces consideration processing depth

intervention_analysis.purpose: Design strategic framing interventions and campaigns

framing_strategies.application: Use conservative values for liberal policies

competitive_framing_interventions.preemptive_framing: Shape issue interpretation before opposition frames
competitive_framing_interventions.multi_venue_reinforcement: Repeat frames across legislative and public venues
competitive_framing_interventions.frame_in_thought_targeting: Activate desired considerations in audience minds
competitive_framing_interventions.elite_frame_cascade: Use legislative leaders to amplify frame reach

strategic_considerations.frame_strength_optimization: Maximize cultural resonance and logical appeal
strategic_considerations.learning_facilitation: Support informed rather than manipulated opinion

balance_validation.theoretical_fidelity: High - Uses Chong & Druckman 2007 concepts directly
